title.en: Asuma-sensei no Ai wa Omokute Amai

altTitles.ja: 遊馬先生の愛は重くて甘い

altTitles.ja-ro: Asuma-sensei no Ai wa Omokute Amai

description.en: Asaka's favorite thing to do every morning is to talk with her neighbor, a handsome man dressed in kimono, Mr. Asuma. For Asaka, who is not good at socializing, talking with the kind and gentle Mr. Asuma was a comforting experience. One day, when she went to work, she was told that she would be cut off from her temporary job, and a month later, she would lose her job and her house. With no one to rely on, Asaka was at her wit's end, but it was Mr. Asuma who came to her rescue. He is a novelist and lives in a Japanese house with two cats he found. As Mr. Asuma gently soothed Asaka, he smiled and said, "When I see a poor little girl, I just want to spoil her..."
description.ja: 麻花の毎朝の楽しみは、ご近所の和装イケメン・遊馬さんとお話すること。人付き合いが不得手な麻花にとって、優しく穏やかな遊馬さんとの会話は癒しだった。ある日会社へ出勤すると派遣切りを宣告され、1ヶ月後には職も住む家も失うことに。頼れる人もなく、途方にくれる麻花に救いの手を差し伸べたのは遊馬さんだった。小説家をしているという彼は、日本家屋に拾い猫2頭と住んでいた。遊馬さんは麻花を優しくあやしながら「可哀想な子を見るとね、どうしても甘やかしたくなるんだ」と微笑んでいて…。
